com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxCollider, Camera, Model, Transform

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents GameObject's component. Components are used to add functionality to GameObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Component() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finish()
      Called when Component is removed from it's owning GameObject and in the end of engine instance's life.
      protected Application getApplication() 
      GameObject getGameObject()
      Returns the GameObject to which this Component is assigned.
      void postUpdate()
      Called every frame after update() has been called on all Components of all GameObjects.
      void start()
      Called when Component is added to it's owning GameObject.
      void update()
      Called every frame.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Component

        protected Component()

    • Method Detail

      • getApplication

        protected final Application getApplication()

      • getGameObject

        public final GameObject getGameObject()
        Returns the GameObject to which this Component is assigned.
        Returns:
        GameObject to which this Component is assigned.

      • start

        public void start()
        Called when Component is added to it's owning GameObject.

      • update

        public void update()
        Called every frame. Override this method to update state of this Component.

      • postUpdate

        public void postUpdate()
        Called every frame after update() has been called on all Components of all GameObjects. Override this method to perform actions after state update, such as rendering.

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Called when Component is removed from it's owning GameObject and in the end of engine instance's life.
